title: Retired police officer joins politics to stand in Lincoln council leader’s seat
description: A retired Lincolnshire Police officer is vying for Ric Metcalfe’s seat on City of Lincoln Council in this year’s local election. title: Waverley Street raw sewage problem caused by 'wet wipes'

title: Tory MP becomes 58th to quit at next election as Conservatives near 1997 record
description: More Tory MPs are quitting at the next election than at any point since 1997, when 75 stood aside in advance of a contest that saw Labour win a landslide victory under Sir Tony Blair.
